sources.title: Octopus Pot | Full Drama Movie | Mykel Shannon Jenkins
sources.description:
Octopus Pot - A broken man finds the one thing he can't live without, only to lose it. He can't bring back the woman he loves, but he can cover the ground with the blood of his enemy.
2021.  Stars: Mykel Shannon Jenkins, Shawn Kathryn Kane, Hafedh Dakhlaoui

metadata.Plot: A broken man finds the one thing he can't live without only to lose it. He can't bring back the woman he loves, but he can cover the ground with the blood of his enemy. "OCTOPUS POT" syndrome - the Japanese call it Takotsubo syndrome - when stressful events cause the heart to balloon and distort, causing it to look like a traditional fishing trap. It scars and weakens the heart muscles and causes the left ventricle to distort and enlarge. The only outcome is certain death.
metadata.Actors: Mykel Shannon Jenkins, Shawn Kathryn Kane, Hafedh Dakhlaoui
